name: gherkin-beautifier-vs-code-plugin
description: Gherkin Beautifier is a VS Code Plugin for indentation of Gherkin/Cucumber .feature files

configuration.title: Gherkin Beautifier VS Code Plugin Configuration

conf.view.identsBefore.Feature.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Feature'

conf.view.identsBefore.Rule.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Rule'

conf.view.identsBefore.Scenario.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Scneario'

conf.view.identsBefore.Examples.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Examples'

conf.view.identsBefore.Background.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Background'

conf.view.identsBefore.ScenarioOutline.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Scenario Outline'

conf.view.identsBefore.ScenarioTemplate.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Scenario Template'

conf.view.identsBefore.Given.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Given'

conf.view.identsBefore.When.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'When'

conf.view.identsBefore.Then.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'Then'

conf.view.identsBefore.And.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'And'

conf.view.identsBefore.But.description: How many identation symbols to insert before 'But'

conf.view.identsBefore.At.description: How many identation symbols to insert before '@'

conf.view.identsBefore.Table.description: How many identation symbols to insert before table '|'
